text: 140px Tony Martin (pictured at the 2016 Tour de France) is the record winner of the German time trial championship, having taken the title nine times. Bert Grabsch (pictured at the 2010 Tour de Romandie) won the German time trial championship four times during his career. The German National Time Trial Championships have been held since 1995. ==Men== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:95%" |- style="text-align:center; background:#e4e4e4; font- weight:bold;" | style="background:#ddd;
